MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in 332 Crow Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:21pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:47pm on  Friday, 30 April 2021
